item.description:
Do you have someone in your life that you haven’t been able to forgive?

Are you holding onto past resentments for a wrong that was done to you?

Or are you unable to forgive yourself for past regrets?

If you are ready to dissolve the stagnant weight of resentment & release any chains that bind you, & be empowered to attract more of what you want, please join us!

Suzy Spivey, Daring to Dream Coach & Catalyst for Change, will be helping you look at Forgiveness with a new lens in this interactive discussion, including:

  • What Forgiveness really means - this new view may surprise you!
  • The powerful impact Forgiveness can have on your life, specifically
    your health & well-being
  • How Forgiveness can literally set you free - to be an "attractor" magnet!

***************************************************

About Suzy Spivey:

email: suzy@suzyspivey.com

Suzy Spivey, founder of Daring to Dream™, is a Certified Coach, Speaker, Workshop Leader and TV Host/Producer. Suzy’s mission is to offer inspiration, hope & practical advice for living the life of your dreams. She specializes in guiding those in transition, considering a mid-life re-design, or seeking more meaning & purpose in life to create the life of their dreams, one step at a time.

Suzy was personally trained by Marcia Wieder, America’s Dream Coach & founder of Dream University (& personal coach to Jack Canfield). Her life purpose training was with Tim Kelly, founder of The True Purpose Institute. She has also trained in Voice Dialogue facilitation with Carole Kammen, founder of Pathways Institute.

If you are in transition, feel stuck, or looking to make your dreams come true, contact Suzy for help in making the shift to move you forward.

***************************************************

RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

***************************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :

(1) Go here:  http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in

(3) Scroll down and click "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Power of Forgiveness – Ready to be set free to attract more?
